data.Title: Google June 2024 Spam Update Complete
data.Description: Google has completed the rollout of its June 2024 spam update. The update, which began on June 13, is designed to target websites that are engaging in spammy practices.

data.Title: Google Warns of Soft 404 Errors and Their Impact on SEO
data.Description: Google's Gary Illyes warns of soft 404 errors' impact on web crawling and recommends proper error handling to improve SEO and site efficiency.

data.Title: Microsoft AI CEO: Web content is 'freeware'

data.Title: Google Product Studio Expands to UK, India, and Japan
data.Description: Google Product Studio now works in the UK, India, and Japan. Plus there are new themes to choose from and new file upload feature

data.Title: Bing Search People Also Ask May Include AI-Generated Content
data.Description: Microsoft may now include AI generated content within the Bing Search people also ask sections.  Bing is labeling some of the people also ask boxes with the disclaimer, "Includes Al generated content."

data.Title: Google Ads Introduces New WordPress Specific Conversion Google Tag Code
data.Description: ICYMI: New WordPress specific conversion Google Tag code for Google Ads seroundtable.com/google-ads-wor…

data.Title: Report: Menu Items and Popular Times May Be Google Local Ranking Signals
data.Description: There is a new report out that says menu items and how busy you are during Google Maps popular times are both ranking factors and signals for Google's local ranking system.  Claudia Tomina posted the details on her blog and told me she tested this across numerous businesses.

data.Title: Google's Search Dilemma: The Battle With 'Not' & Prepositions
data.Description: Google still struggles with complex search queries, particularly those using "not" and prepositions, despite AI advancements.

data.Title: Google AI Overviews Now Feature Link Cards at the Top
data.Description: Confirmed: Google AI Overviews with link cards at the top seroundtable.com/google-ai-over…

data.Title: Google Focusing on System-Level Search Ranking Improvements for Scalability
data.Description: ICYMI: Google is working on improving search rankings on the system level, so it can scale, not on an individual site level seroundtable.com/google-search-…

data.Title: Google Analytics 4 to Integrate AI-Powered Insights
data.Description: With Universal Analytics going away completely soon, Google Analytics 4 will add AI-powered insights to its reporting.

data.Title: Amazon Plans Temu-Like Section for Cheap Goods from China
data.Description: Amazon plans to launch a Temu-like section featuring cheap items that ship directly from China to overseas consumers.

data.Title: TikTok Shop Orders Surge as Platform Ramps Up Ecommerce Efforts
data.Description: Alarms going off at Amazon and Google -> Route: TikTok Shop saw a 13% jump in orders from April to May, as TikTok appears to be hiring hundreds of employees in the US to support its e-commerce efforts "By the beginning of 2024, it was gunning to grow Shop tenfold in the U.S. to

data.Title: Google: Don't Shy Away from Brand Names in Review Content
data.Description: Danny Sullivan, Google's Search Liaison, responded to some new SEO advice floating around the SEOverse that suggests you should not add the brand name of the products you are reviewing in your review content. Sullivan disagreed with this advice and said, "you shouldn't be afraid to mention the brand name of something you are reviewing."

data.Title: Google to Remove Continuous Scroll from Search Results
data.Description: Google is dropping continuous scroll in search results. Google said this change is to allow the search company to serve the search results faster on more searches, instead of automatically loading results that users haven't explicitly requested.
